title: Gastric duplication cyst: electron microscopic and immunohistochemical study.
summary: The lining of a gastric duplication cyst was examined ultrastructurally and immunohistochemically. The cyst lining displayed the range of differentiation seen in normal fundic mucosa....
abstract: The lining of a gastric duplication cyst was examined ultrastructurally and immunohistochemically. The cyst lining displayed the range of differentiation seen in normal fundic mucosa.
